document.discussion_title: Queen Maeve: Higgins on her new book ‘Off You Go’
document.topic_text: ‘I have this feeling that I missed the day in school where they explained how to live your life.” Maeve Higgins is on the phone talking about her new book, Off You Go, a follow-up to the brilliant collection of essays We Have A Good Time ,
document.post: ‘I have this feeling that I missed the day in school where they explained how to live your life.” Maeve Higgins is on the phone talking about her new book, Off You Go, a follow-up to the brilliant collection of essays We Have A Good Time ,
